ResourceHeader.Description: Amateur Radio Signal Report is collected from Amateur Radio HF receivers from volunteers. Original data are uploaded to three up-stream data providers including WSPRNet, PSKReporter, and Reverse Beacon Network.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge HamSCI team at The University of Scranton and The University of Alabama that collects amateur radio signal report from volunteers via three up-stream data providers including WSPRNet, PSKReporter, and Reverse Beacon Network. The data are available to public at MIT Madrigal database. This effort is supported by NASA grant number 80NSSC21K1772.
